crops.name: Maize
crops.introduction: Maize is a major food crop in Nepal, grown particularly in the hilly and mid-hilly regions.
crops.seed_selection: Select high-yielding varieties with disease resistance suitable for local climate.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Use organic fertilizers before planting; balanced use of nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium.
crops.irrigation: Maize requires 2-3 irrigations, particularly during germination, flowering, and grain-filling stages.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Maize-wheat, maize-vegetables, maize-millet rotations are common.
crops.climate_and_soil: Warm and humid climate; well-drained soil is ideal.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used for making flour, bread, porridge, and animal feed.
crops.spacing: 75 cm between rows and 25 cm between plants

crops.name: Rice
crops.introduction: Rice is the staple food crop of Nepal, occupying about 45% of the total cultivated area.
crops.seed_selection: Choose varieties based on altitude, water availability, and local preferences.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires thorough plowing and puddling; apply farmyard manure 3-4 weeks before transplanting.
crops.irrigation: Needs constant water supply during vegetative and reproductive phases.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rice-wheat, rice-potato, rice-vegetables rotations are practiced.
crops.climate_and_soil: Warm and humid climate; clayey loam soil with good water retention capacity.
crops.uses_and_importance: Main staple food; used in various traditional dishes and ceremonies.
crops.spacing: 20 cm between rows and 15 cm between plants

crops.name: Wheat
crops.introduction: Wheat is the third most important cereal crop in Nepal after rice and maize.
crops.seed_selection: Select rust-resistant varieties suitable for local conditions.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Deep plowing is beneficial; apply farmyard manure before sowing and NPK fertilizers as recommended.
crops.irrigation: About 4-5 irrigations are required, with critical stages being crown root initiation and flowering.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rice-wheat rotation is very common in the Terai region.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool and dry climate during growth period; well-drained loamy soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used for making bread, noodles, and various snacks.
crops.spacing: 22-25 cm between rows with continuous sowing

crops.name: Millet
crops.introduction: Finger millet is an important traditional crop in Nepal's hill districts.
crops.seed_selection: Select seeds from healthy previous crop or certified seeds.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires less fertilizer than other cereals; organic manure is beneficial.
crops.irrigation: Mostly grown as rainfed crop; 1-2 irrigations during dry spells.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Often intercropped with legumes; used in rotation with maize.
crops.climate_and_soil: Adapts to diverse climates; grows well in poor soil conditions.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used for making traditional foods like dhindo; important for food security.
crops.spacing: 10 cm between plants in rows 30 cm apart

crops.name: Potato
crops.introduction: Potato is a major cash crop grown throughout Nepal with high importance in food security.
crops.seed_selection: Use disease-free and well-sprouted seed tubers of appropriate size.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-prepared loose soil; apply farmyard manure and balanced NPK fertilizers.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation needed, especially during tuber formation.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotate with cereals, legumes, or cole crops; avoid solanaceous crops in rotation.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool climate for tuber development; well-drained sandy loam soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Major vegetable crop; used in various culinary preparations.
crops.spacing: 60 cm between rows and 25 cm between plants

crops.name: Mustard
crops.introduction: Mustard is the main oilseed crop grown in Nepal, particularly in the Terai and mid-hills.
crops.seed_selection: Use certified seeds of improved varieties with higher oil content.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Fine seedbed preparation is essential; apply farmyard manure and NPK fertilizers.
crops.irrigation: 2-3 irrigations at critical growth stages.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Often grown as a winter crop after rice or maize.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool and dry climate; well-drained loamy soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Oil extraction for cooking; seed cake used as cattle feed.
crops.spacing: 30-45 cm between rows with continuous sowing

crops.name: Cardamom
crops.introduction: Large cardamom is a high-value cash crop grown in the eastern hills of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use rhizomes from disease-free, high-yielding plants.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Apply organic manure; avoid chemical fertilizers for premium production.
crops.irrigation: Requires high humidity; irrigate during dry periods.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Grown as a perennial crop under tree shade; intercropping is limited.
crops.production: Average yield is about 450 kg/hectare of dried capsules.
crops.climate_and_soil: Humid sub-tropical climate; well-drained sandy loam soil rich in organic matter.
crops.uses_and_importance: Major export commodity; used as spice and in traditional medicine.
crops.spacing: 1.8-2.4 meters between plants

crops.name: Ginger
crops.introduction: Ginger is an important commercial spice crop in Nepal's mid-hill regions.
crops.seed_selection: Use disease-free rhizomes with at least one viable bud.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Apply well-decomposed farmyard manure during land preparation.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation required but avoid waterlogging.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotated with cereals like maize; sometimes intercropped with legumes.
crops.production: Average production is about 12 tons/hectare of fresh rhizomes.
crops.climate_and_soil: Warm humid climate; well-drained sandy loam rich in organic matter.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used as spice, medicine, and exported as fresh or dried product.
crops.spacing: 25-30 cm between plants in rows 45-60 cm apart

crops.name: Turmeric
crops.introduction: Turmeric is widely cultivated in the lowland and mid-hill regions of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Select disease-free rhizomes with 2-3 buds.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-prepared loose soil with high organic matter content.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation needed during growth period.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Often rotated with cereals or legumes; can be intercropped with maize.
crops.production: Average yield is around 15 tons/hectare of fresh rhizomes.
crops.climate_and_soil: Warm and humid climate; well-drained loamy soil rich in organic matter.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used as spice, coloring agent, and in traditional medicine.
crops.spacing: 25 cm between plants in rows 45 cm apart

crops.name: Lentil
crops.introduction: Lentil is the most important pulse crop in Nepal, mainly grown in the Terai region.
crops.seed_selection: Use disease-free, uniform-sized seeds of improved varieties.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Light tillage after rice harvest; low fertilizer requirement due to nitrogen fixation.
crops.irrigation: Usually grown as rainfed crop; 1-2 irrigations improve yield.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Mainly grown after rice in rice-lentil rotation.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool and dry climate; well-drained loamy soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Major source of plant protein; used for making dal and various dishes.
crops.spacing: 25-30 cm between rows with continuous sowing

crops.name: Chickpea
crops.introduction: Chickpea is an important winter legume crop in Nepal's Terai and inner Terai regions.
crops.seed_selection: Select bold, healthy seeds of suitable varieties.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Minimal fertilizer requirement; seed treatment with Rhizobium culture beneficial.
crops.irrigation: Usually grown on residual soil moisture; 1-2 irrigations in dry conditions.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Often grown after rice; sometimes intercropped with mustard.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool dry climate; deep loamy soil with good drainage.
crops.uses_and_importance: Rich source of protein; used in various traditional foods.
crops.spacing: 30 cm between rows with 10 cm between plants

crops.name: Black Gram
crops.introduction: Black gram is widely cultivated in Nepal as a summer season pulse crop.
crops.seed_selection: Use certified seeds with good germination percentage.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-prepared field; light fertilizer application.
crops.irrigation: Mostly grown as rainfed crop; irrigation during flowering improves yield.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Often intercropped with maize; used in rotation with cereals.
crops.climate_and_soil: Warm humid climate; wide soil adaptability.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used for making dal and various traditional dishes.
crops.spacing: 30-45 cm between rows with continuous sowing

crops.name: Tea
crops.introduction: Tea is a major plantation crop in eastern Nepal, particularly in Ilam and surrounding districts.
crops.seed_selection: Vegetative propagation through cuttings preferred over seeds.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Regular application of organic and inorganic fertilizers; mulching practiced.
crops.irrigation: Irrigation required during dry season; drainage essential during monsoon.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Permanent plantation crop; shade trees often integrated.
crops.production: Average yield ranges from 1.5-2.5 tons/hectare of processed tea.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool humid climate; well-drained acidic soil rich in organic matter.
crops.uses_and_importance: Major export commodity; processed into various tea grades.
crops.spacing: 120 cm between rows and 60-75 cm between plants

crops.name: Coffee
crops.introduction: Coffee is an emerging commercial crop in the mid-hill regions of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use seedlings raised from selected beans of productive trees.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Apply organic manure; mulching essential for moisture conservation.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation during dry season; avoid waterlogging.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Grown as permanent crop; often intercropped with fruits or spices initially.
crops.production: Average yield is about 800 kg/hectare of dried beans.
crops.climate_and_soil: Moderate temperature with distinct wet and dry seasons; well-drained loamy soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Growing export commodity; processed into arabica coffee.
crops.spacing: 2-2.5 meters between plants in rows 2.5-3 meters apart

crops.name: Cauliflower
crops.introduction: Cauliflower is a major commercial vegetable in Nepal grown in various agro-ecological zones.
crops.seed_selection: Use hybrid seeds for commercial production with good curd quality.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-prepared soil with high organic matter and balanced fertilization.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation needed; avoid water stress during curd formation.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotate with non-cruciferous crops; avoid cabbage family crops in succession.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool climate for curd development; well-drained fertile loamy soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Major commercial vegetable; used in various culinary preparations.
crops.spacing: 60 cm between rows and 45 cm between plants

crops.name: Tomato
crops.introduction: Tomato is one of the most important commercial vegetables grown throughout Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use hybrid seeds for commercial production; disease-resistant varieties preferred.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-drained soil with balanced fertilization; staking needed.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation required; drip irrigation is beneficial.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotate with non-solanaceous crops; avoid eggplant, potato in rotation.
crops.production: Average open field yield is about 19 tons/hectare; higher in protected cultivation.
crops.climate_and_soil: Warm season crop with mild temperature; well-drained sandy loam soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Essential vegetable used fresh and processed; major cash crop.
crops.spacing: 60 cm between rows and 45 cm between plants

crops.name: Cucumber
crops.introduction: Cucumber is a popular summer vegetable crop widely grown in Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use hybrid seeds for better yield and quality; select suitable varieties.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-prepared soil with adequate organic matter.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation needed; mulching beneficial for moisture conservation.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotate with non-cucurbit crops; sometimes intercropped with maize.
crops.climate_and_soil: Warm humid climate; well-drained fertile soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used as salad and vegetable; growing cash crop.
crops.spacing: 120-150 cm between rows and 60 cm between plants

crops.name: Orange
crops.introduction: Sweet orange is an important fruit crop in the mid-hill regions of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use grafted plants from certified nurseries.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Regular application of organic manure; balanced NPK fertilizers.
crops.irrigation: Irrigation needed during dry season; mulching beneficial.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Permanent crop; intercropping possible in young orchards.
crops.production: Average yield is about 8-10 tons/hectare in well-managed orchards.
crops.climate_and_soil: Subtropical climate; well-drained slightly acidic soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Major fruit crop with high commercial value; source of vitamin C.
crops.spacing: 5-6 meters between plants

crops.name: Banana
crops.introduction: Banana is a major fruit crop in the Terai and lower hills of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use disease-free suckers or tissue culture plants.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires high organic matter and balanced fertilization.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation needed; drainage essential during monsoon.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Grown as monocrop; intercropping possible in initial stages.
crops.climate_and_soil: Hot humid climate; deep well-drained soil rich in organic matter.
crops.uses_and_importance: Major fruit crop consumed fresh and processed; important cash crop.
crops.spacing: 2-2.5 meters between plants in rows 2.5-3 meters apart

crops.name: Mango
crops.introduction: Mango is the most important fruit crop in the Terai region of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use grafted plants of superior varieties.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Regular application of organic manure before flowering.
crops.irrigation: Irrigation beneficial during flowering and fruit development.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Permanent crop; intercropping possible in young orchards.
crops.production: Average yield is about 10 tons/hectare in commercial orchards.
crops.climate_and_soil: Tropical and subtropical climate; deep well-drained soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Major summer fruit with high commercial value.
crops.spacing: 8-10 meters between plants

crops.name: Sugarcane
crops.introduction: Sugarcane is an important industrial crop in the Terai region of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use disease-free setts from 8-10 month old crop.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires deep plowing and adequate fertilization.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation needed; critical during tillering and grand growth phase.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Often rotated with pulses; intercropping with pulses or vegetables in early stage.
crops.climate_and_soil: Hot humid climate; deep fertile well-drained soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Raw material for sugar industry; also used for jaggery production.
crops.spacing: 75-90 cm between rows with continuous placement of setts

crops.name: Jute
crops.introduction: Jute is a major cash crop in the eastern Terai region of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use certified seeds of improved varieties.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-prepared field with adequate nitrogen.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation required during early growth stage.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotated with rice or wheat; monocropping common.
crops.production: Average yield is about 1.8 tons/hectare of fiber.
crops.climate_and_soil: Hot humid climate; alluvial soil with good water retention.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used for making sacks, ropes, carpets; export commodity.
crops.spacing: 30 cm between rows with continuous sowing

crops.name: Garlic
crops.introduction: Garlic is an important spice crop grown during winter in various parts of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use healthy, disease-free cloves of uniform size.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-prepared soil with adequate organic matter.
crops.irrigation: Light but frequent irrigation beneficial; avoid waterlogging.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotate with non-allium crops; monocropping common.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool dry climate during vegetative growth; well-drained loamy soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Essential spice used in cooking; has medicinal properties.
crops.spacing: 15 cm between plants in rows 20 cm apart

crops.name: Onion
crops.introduction: Onion is a widely grown vegetable crop in Nepal with year-round demand.
crops.seed_selection: Use either seeds for nursery raising or bulbs for multiplication.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-prepared soil with balanced fertilization.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation needed; critical during bulb development.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotate with non-allium crops; monocropping common.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool climate for bulb development; well-drained sandy loam soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Essential kitchen item used fresh and as spice.
crops.spacing: 15 cm between plants in rows 20 cm apart

crops.name: Soybean
crops.introduction: Soybean is grown in Nepal both as an oilseed and pulse crop, mainly in hilly regions.
crops.seed_selection: Use certified seeds with good germination rate.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Moderate fertilizer requirement; seed inoculation with Rhizobium beneficial.
crops.irrigation: Mostly grown as rainfed crop; irrigation beneficial during flowering and pod filling.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Often intercropped with maize; used in rotation with cereals.
crops.climate_and_soil: Warm climate with moderate rainfall; wide soil adaptability.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used for oil extraction, as pulse, and for making various food products.
crops.spacing: 45 cm between rows and 10 cm between plants

crops.name: Barley
crops.introduction: Barley is an important winter cereal crop in the high hills and mountains of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use clean, graded seeds of improved varieties.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Moderate fertilizer requirement; farmyard manure application beneficial.
crops.irrigation: Usually grown as rainfed crop; 1-2 irrigations improve yield.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Often grown after legumes; monocropping common.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool climate; wide soil adaptability including marginal lands.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used for making flour, animal feed, and local beverages.
crops.spacing: 22-25 cm between rows with continuous sowing

crops.name: Buckwheat
crops.introduction: Buckwheat is an important traditional crop in the high hills and mountains of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use clean seeds from previous harvest or local market.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Low fertilizer requirement; grows well in poor soil.
crops.irrigation: Grown as rainfed crop; minimal irrigation requirement.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Short-duration crop often fitted into various rotations.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool climate; adapts to poor soil conditions.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used for making flour and traditional dishes; good bee forage.
crops.spacing: 30 cm between rows with continuous sowing

crops.name: Peanut
crops.introduction: Peanut is grown in sandy soil areas of Terai and river basins in Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use well-filled pods with viable seeds; treat with fungicide.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-prepared loose soil; calcium application beneficial.
crops.irrigation: Irrigation needed during flowering and pod development.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotated with cereals; sometimes intercropped with maize.
crops.production: Average yield is about 1.2 tons/hectare of unshelled nuts.
crops.climate_and_soil: Warm climate; light sandy loam soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Used for oil extraction; consumed roasted, boiled, or processed.
crops.spacing: 45 cm between rows and 15 cm between plants

crops.name: Cabbage
crops.introduction: Cabbage is a popular vegetable crop grown year-round in different ecological zones of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use hybrid seeds for commercial production.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires well-prepared soil with high organic matter.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation needed; avoid water stress.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotate with non-cruciferous crops; monocropping common.
crops.climate_and_soil: Cool climate for head formation; fertile well-drained soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Major vegetable used in various culinary preparations.
crops.spacing: 60 cm between rows and 45 cm between plants

crops.name: Bitter Gourd
crops.introduction: Bitter gourd is a popular summer vegetable grown in the Terai and mid-hills of Nepal.
crops.seed_selection: Use seeds from mature fruits of healthy plants.
crops.fertilization_and_tilling: Requires rich soil with adequate organic matter; trellising needed.
crops.irrigation: Regular irrigation required during fruiting period.
crops.crop_rotation_and_intercropping: Rotate with non-cucurbit crops; monocropping common.
crops.climate_and_soil: Warm humid climate; well-drained fertile soil.
crops.uses_and_importance: Popular vegetable with medicinal properties, especially for diabetes.
crops.spacing: 150 cm between rows and 60 cm between plants
